item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @untalented untalented
item.description:
@untalented wrote:

Hey, I made server and I made it online… Gave it to my friend and he can’t open client, my client says :

@echo off
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe” -cp asm-all-3.3.jar;clientlibs.jar; RunClient
pause

And, my friend don’t have Jre7 ( so sure he can’t open it ), he tried to download it… his pc can get x32 only… and jre7 is x64, so what i can do? he tried to make to his jre ( jre6 ) but nothing happens… he can’t run client.

Read full topic
